directions: Stir mayonnaise, sour cream, buttermilk, lemon juice, sherry, and garlic salt together in a bowl. Fold blue cheese through the mixture.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 2 hours.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste
4 ounces crumbled blue cheese (such as Maytag®)
title: Tasty Blue Cheese Salad Dressing
